room_title: Escape room "The Shipwreck" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We had a blast trying to escape the Shipwrecked room...Jiovanni was a great leader and Holly was hilarious giving out instructions before we went in...I would definitely recommend giving these folks a try, clues were challenging but not overwhelming and the rooms were very clean and organized. Definitely will be back for another challenge...

room_title: Escape room "The Shipwreck" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Had a great time in the Shipwreck room. Our staff member Holly was awesome when we needed clues. We will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Shipwreck" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We escaped with the coins from The Shipwreck! So fun and difficult, but not impossible. Emilee was our game master and she was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Shipwreck" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We had a group together for The Shipwreck room today and had a great time. Most of us were first timers and had no idea what to expect. The experience was so great. Everything is appropriately challenging and well done. Our staff member, Grace, was an absolute rock star. I know for all of us today, we are looking forward to trying the rest of the rooms. Highest recommendation for entertainment in the Florence area.
